about_the_game:
Discover new stars in a massive galaxy. Explore hostile planets full of dangerous enemies. Build formidable bases to survive all alone. Make the best of your circumstances as a wandering astronaut in this innovative adventure survival RPG, Sole Seeker.

With each star system containing different environments and organisms, each base built represents new opportunities for exploration and harvest. Survival without defenses to support you is difficult. Plan your routes carefully to succeed in your hunt for resources. Your mysterious benefactor will be pleased by your success, but is unable to help you outside of a space station.


  • Travel

    Explore a massive galaxy that's lightyears wide. Discover thousands of stars and many more planets that reward far travels. The varying conditions in each area make it imperative to map out the area before setting up camp.

  • Fight

    Planet natives are widespread and don't take kindly to outsiders. Each organism has unique strength and weaknesses that make them challenging threats. Be prepared to dodge their attacks and use your outpost defenses to your advantage.

  • Build

    By yourself, you're a simple astronaut. Nimble, but limited to melee attacks and a net launcher. Building an outpost on planets increases your survival chances immensely. Walls, turrets, traps, and more will help you solidify your hierarchical dominance.

highlighted.name: Just to be the man who flew 1,000 miles
